title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 108 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 108 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.
lineList.cn: （大卫的诗歌）神阿，我心坚定。我口（原文作荣耀）要唱诗歌颂。

lineList.en: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.
lineList.cn: 琴瑟阿，你们当醒起。我自己要极早醒起。

lineList.en: I will praise thee, O LORD, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.
lineList.cn: 耶和华阿，我要在万民中称谢你，在列邦中歌颂你。

lineList.en: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.
lineList.cn: 因为，你的慈爱，大过诸天；你的诚实，达到穹苍。

lineList.en: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;
lineList.cn: 神阿，愿你崇高过于诸天。愿你的荣耀，高过全地。

lineList.en: That thy beloved may be delivered: save with thy right hand, and answer me.
lineList.cn: 求你应允我们，用右手拯救我们，好叫你所亲爱的人得救。

lineList.en: God hath spoken in his holiness; I will rejoice, I will divide Shechem, and mete out the valley of Succoth.
lineList.cn: 神已经指着他的圣洁说（说或作应许我），我要欢乐。我要分开示剑，丈量疏割谷。

lineList.en: Gilead is mine; Manasseh is mine; Ephraim also is the strength of mine head; Judah is my lawgiver;
lineList.cn: 基列是我的。玛拿西是我的。以法莲是护卫我头的。犹大是我的杖。

lineList.en: Moab is my washpot; over Edom will I cast out my shoe; over Philistia will I triumph.
lineList.cn: 摩押是我的沭浴盆。我要向以东抛鞋。我必因胜非利士呼喊。

lineList.en: Who will bring me into the strong city? who will lead me into Edom?
lineList.cn: 谁能领我进坚固城。谁能引我到以东地。

lineList.en: Wilt not thou, O God, who hast cast us off? and wilt not thou, O God, go forth with our hosts?
lineList.cn: 神阿，你不是丢弃了我们吗。神阿，你不和我们的军兵同去吗。

lineList.en: Give us help from trouble: for vain is the help of man.
lineList.cn: 求你帮助我们攻击敌人，因为人的帮助是枉然的。

lineList.en: Through God we shall do valiantly: for he it is that shall tread down our enemies.
lineList.cn: 我们倚靠神，才得施展大能，因为践踏我们敌人的就是他。
